TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlParseException extends System.SystemException

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Serializable

summary.span: 表示来自 WPF 分析器的、特定于分析器的异常的异常类。

span.span: Represents the exception class for parser-specific exceptions from a WPF XAML parser.

summary.span: 此异常用于 .NET Framework 3.0 和 .NET Framework 3.5 中的 XAML API 或 WPF XAML 分析器操作，或者通过调用 API 而特别用于 WPF XAML 分析器。

span.span: This exception is used in XAML API or WPF XAML parser operations from .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5, or for specific use of the WPF XAML parser by calling API.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅用于 WPF 实现的 XAML 分析器, 该分析器对 WPF 应用程序执行 XAML 分析和加载。 is used only for the WPF-implemented XAML parser that performs the XAML parsing and loading for WPF applications. 具体而言, 例外仅适用于应用程序的目标[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。Specifically, the exception is only relevant when an application targets [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 异常还可能源自用户代码, 即对连接 WPF 实现的 XAML 分析器的 Api 的运行时调用, 以便从正在运行的 WPF 应用程序 (例如, 调用) 中加载 XAML。The exception can also originate from user code in run-time calls to APIs that hook up the WPF-implemented XAML parser to load XAML from within a running WPF application (for example, calls to ). 对于[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)],通常报告XAML处理异常的异常在不同的命名空间()和不同的程序集(system.exception)中定义。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the exception that typically reports XAML processing exceptions is defined in a different namespace () and a different assembly (System.Xaml). 除非您正在编写等效于 WPF XAML 分析器或[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]使用和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]目标, 否则通常不会从自己的代码中引发。Unless you are writing an equivalent to the WPF XAML parser or working with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] targeting, you generally will not throw from your own code. 但是, 有时需要处理异常。However, handling for the exception is sometimes necessary. 对于应用程序方案, 可能需要取消 XAML 分析错误, 应用程序级别的事件处理程序是处理运行时的一种方法。For application scenarios, where you may want to suppress XAML parse errors, a event handler at the application level is one way to handle a run-time . 是否取消异常或让它们看起来用户代码取决于你为加载 XAML 而设计应用程序的方式, 以及分配给应用程序所加载的 XAML 的信任级别。Whether to suppress exceptions or let them surface to user code depends on how you design your application for purposes of loading XAML, and the trust level that you assign to the XAML your application loads. 有关详细信息, 请参阅 xaml[概述 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)中的[xaml 安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md)或 "xaml 安全性" 部分。For more information, see [XAML Security Considerations](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md) or "XAML Security" section of [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). 对于应用程序的页, 当引发时, 它通常位于页面类发出的`InitializeComponent`调用的上下文中, 这是 wpf 应用程序模型在每页级别的 wpf XAML 分析器的使用入口点。For pages of an application, when the is thrown, it is usually in the context of the `InitializeComponent` call made by your page class, which is the entry point for the WPF application model's usage of the WPF XAML parser at the per-page level. 因此, 另一个可能的处理策略`try/catch`是将`InitializeComponent`块放置在中。Therefore another possible handling strategy is to place `try/catch` blocks in `InitializeComponent`. 但是, 这种方法并不能很好地与模板、可视化设计图面以及挂钩`InitializeComponent`的其他生成的源集成。However, this technique does not integrate well with templates, visual design surfaces and other generated sources that hook up `InitializeComponent`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为上一个异常的直接结果引发的异常应包括对上一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

summary.span: 引发异常时获取基 URI 信息。

span.span: Gets base URI information when the exception is thrown.
The parser context base URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发生异常时, 由于分析器上下文的原因, 基本 URI 可能可用。Base URI is potentially available because of parser context when the exception occurred. 了解基本 URI 对于调试资源解析错误是根本原因的情况非常有用。Knowing the base URI can be useful for debugging cases where a resource resolution error is the underlying cause.
